|chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = U40Z028 |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = common |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = 12/17/2010 |price = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B0188D14TG |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ''DW1530 / DW 1530'' [http://support.euro.dell.com/support/downloads/download.aspx?c=il&l=en&s=gen&releaseid=R292179&formatcnt=0&libid=0&typeid=-1&dateid=-1&formatid=-1&source=-1&fileid=435844 May be used in the following laptops..] *Latitude E5420 *Latitude E5520 *Latitude E6320 *Latitude E6420 *Latitude E6420 ATG *Latitude E6420 XFR *Latitude E6520 *[http://www.dell.com/us/enterprise/p/latitude-xt3/pd#TechSpec Latitude XT3 (P17G)] *Precision M4600 *Precision M6600 Presumed to also use a A4:17:31 OUI like the one pictured in the [[Ubee DVW325]] ===lspci -nnv dump=== 
05:00.0 Network controller [0280]: Broadcom BCM43228 802.11a/b/g/n [14e4:4359]
        Subsystem: Dell Wireless 1530 Half-size Mini PCIe Card [1028:0011]
        Physical Slot: 1
        Flags: bus master, fast devsel, latency 0, IRQ 19
        Memory at f1d00000 (64-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=16K]
        Capabilities: [40] Power Management version 3
        Capabilities: [58] Vendor Specific Information: Len=78 
        Capabilities: [48] MSI: Enable- Count=1/1 Maskable- 64bit+
        Capabilities: [d0] Express Endpoint, MSI 00
        Capabilities: [100] Advanced Error Reporting
        Capabilities: [13c] Virtual Channel
        Capabilities: [160] Device Serial Number 00-00-f9-ff-ff-c0-38-59
        Capabilities: [16c] Power Budgeting 
        Kernel driver in use: bcma-pci-bridge

bcma: bus1: Found chip with id 0xA8DC, rev 0x00 and package 0x08
bcma: bus1: Core 0 found: ChipCommon (manuf 0x4BF, id 0x800, rev 0x25, class 0x0)
bcma: bus1: Core 1 found: IEEE 802.11 (manuf 0x4BF, id 0x812, rev 0x1E, class 0x0)
bcma: bus1: Core 2 found: PCIe (manuf 0x4BF, id 0x820, rev 0x12, class 0x0)
bcma: bus1: Core 3 found: SDIO Device (manuf 0x4BF, id 0x829, rev 0x07, class 0x0)
